LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_ThirdLung.label: extra nano-filter lung
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_ThirdLung.description: While only being marginally more efficient than a normal lung, this lung is equipped with a series of filters, able to process out a large proportion of airborne toxins.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_SecondHeart.label: auxilary heart
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_SecondHeart.description: This auxilary heart increases the amount of oxygen going though the person's body, allowing them to do work more efficiently.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_Combat.label: combat serum gland
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_Combat.description: This gland injects a potent brew of combat drugs into the body, significantly increasing close combat capabilities.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_Hormone.label: hormone regulator
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_Hormone.description: This gland regulates the mood of the host, making it much harder for their mind to snap.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_Lymph.label: lymphatic proliferator
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_Lymph.description: This gland significantly boosts it's hosts immunizing capability, rendering them immune to most normal infectious agents.
